Title: Search and Destroy
Writer: Jonathan Nolan (created by), Zak Schwartz, Dan Dietz (story editor), Lucas O'Connor (story editor)
Actors: Jim Caviezel, Kevin Chapman, Amy Acker, Michael Emerson
Plot: Reese and Finch scramble to protect a software CEO when his behavior becomes erratic following a hacker attack that reveals all his secrets and unravels his life.
